description: Try our easy to follow No-cook Crunchy Stir-fry With Rice Vinegar recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: No-cook Crunchy Stir-fry With Rice Vinegar
name: No-cook Crunchy Stir-fry With Rice Vinegar Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the no-cook stir-fry mix to a serving bowl, then add the remaining noodles. Sprinkle over the green part of the spring onion and the purple basil leaves (if using).
